lines.text: I'm stimulating your erogenous zone, whilst probing your subconscious.

For seven years I've been less than a man, but you're more than a woman. Only you can restore my lower half and make me more than a man. Come. We'll be the Adam and Eve of a new superior race, and they'll worship you as their queen.

[regarding the secret formula in his blood]
I have something in my blood I can't risk you getting.
You might as well give me what you've got.

[lying down on a tied up Billy]
I need the formula, Billy.

[reaching down with her hand to his lower regions]
Come on, touch me. What's the matter, don't you love me anymore?

[mumbles weakly as she kisses his mouth]
No...
All right, you have to promise me you're going to do everything I say.
Sweetwater. They have a Roach problem there I have to take care of.
